page.title: 06FARMING
page.content: A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A FARMWORKER BY PAUL. MY DAD IS A FARMWORKER.HE WORKS ON A FARM NEAR HAREWOOD. HE GETS UP AT 7'CLOCK AND STARTS WORK AT 7.30.FIRST HE FEEDS THE CALVES AND THEN HE HAS A TEABREAK(NORMALLY A CUP OF TEA AND SANDWICHES).AFTER THAT HE ROLLS THE GRASS WITH A TRACTOR.HE HAS A BREAK OF ONE HOUR FOR DINNER.THEN HE WORKS UNTIL 5.30 DOING MAINTENANCE, BUILDING,GRASS ROLLING,FENCING,MENDING TRACTORS AND OTHER MACHINES. MY DAD ENJOYS HIS WORK BUT AT THE END OF THE DAY HE LIKES TO PUT HIS FEET UP AND WATCH T.V.
